input.sentences: i took a trip with some friends to the local amusement park .
we stayed late into the evening so we could see the nightly fireworks display .
those are my friends standing in the background . they bought some delicious street tacos .
the fireworks were the best part of the day .
this was the grand finale and the end of a wonderful day !
output.sentences: There was a festival with a lot of people.
The festival went on throughout the night.
